import React from 'react'; import { Select } from '@../../../../reactify/build'; import { propsCode, selectableCode, selectionCode, searchableCode, simpleCode, singularCode, } from './code-refrence'; import './select.scss'; import DemoCard from '../../components/demo-card'; const SelectDemo = () => (
By default select is multiple but you can use singular to make the select singular
Under the hood Select is a dropdown, so all props you pass to select will be drilled to dropdown
Select also uses list panel and list panel props are pases as is, i.e theme props and size props
); export default SelectDemo;
